name: Mobilization (itch)
description:
Mobilization is a 2D-board-strategy-game currently in prototype phase.

Objective
Destroy all enemy tiles (red)

Controls
Mouse navigation

Mechanics
Player can occupy current and adjacent tiles.
Occupy resource tiles to start gathering resources.
Build walls to strengthen tile and cannon to attack enemy tiles.
Recycle unused cannon to preserve resource.
